item.title: Builds
item.description: All Github Releases Release Download Git Message Conversations - May 21, 2020 [a2a7256] disable hardware AEC on some devices. fixes #3734 Conversations - May 21, 2020 [de941f6] use escaped jid for invites Conversations - May 20, 2020 [bfeebc1] invalide options menu after pinning/unpinning. fixes #3745 Conversations - May 13, 2020 [1b4f9cc] allow 'login with certificate' from welcome screen. fixes #3724 Conversations - May 11, 2020 [7c4566e] Add fastlange changelog too (#3720) Conversations - May 11, 2020 [2c4788b] send retract when unable to setup webrtc as initiator.
